long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows users to hook into Halo+. 
Halo+ is a program that helps automate necessary Quality of Life updates for a GCU Student.

This extension is required when creating an account as it gives us access to imitate requests as you normally would in the Halo Portal Website.
